question:
Consider the following statements about Homeopathy:
  1. It is based on the precept “source which causes a symptom will also cure it”
  2. The Central Council of Homeopathy (CCH) is the apex body to monitor the quality of Homeopathy education in India
  3. It is considered as an effective alternative to antibiotics
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: In order to streamline the medical system in India, the NITI Aayog recently proposed scrapping of two more institutions viz. the Central Council of Homoeopathy (CCH) and the Central Council of Indian Medicine (CCIM). <u>First statement is correct.</u> Currently, the Central Council of Homeopathy (CCH), a statutory apex body under the health ministry monitors homeopathy education in India. <u>Second statement is again correct</u>. Homeopathy is based on precept “source which causes a symptom will also cure it”. <u>Third statement is also correct</u>. Homeopathy is considered as an effective alternative to antibiotics.
